# showsMenuAsPrimaryAction

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the context menu interaction is the control’s primary action.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var showsMenuAsPrimaryAction: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If this value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIControl/contextMenuInteraction] becomes the primary action of the control, and the menu shows in response to the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIControl/Event/touchDown] event.

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].
